messages.subject: Unschoolers in Alabama/Mississippi
messages.msgSnippet: Hello folks.  I am sending this message in hopes of contacting unschoolers in the Alabama/Mississippi area.. Specifically the Birmingham Area.   Fellow
messages.messageBody:
Hello folks. I am sending this message in hopes of contacting
unschoolers in the Alabama/Mississippi area.. Specifically the
Birmingham Area. Fellow unschoolers in the south (NC,SC,GA) are
currently planning a mini conference in early November. The speaker
we have engaged is traveling from Louisiana and she would also like
to plan a speaking engagement about halfway on her trip to Charlotte,
NC (which would be approx in the Birmingham area) I will be glad to
give more details about the speaker and the arrangements if you will
please email me privately if you are interested in finding out more
about this opportunity.

Thank You
